title: Alien Zoo Adventure #2
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Observation Deck
rooms.description: A sterile observation room overlooking the alien containment zones. Through reinforced glass windows, you see bioluminescent creatures floating in containment tanks. Emergency lights flash red, and an alarm klaxon echoes in the distance. The facility appears to be in lockdown mode.

items.name: monitoring control console
items.description: A complex console with multiple screens showing alien specimen data

items.name: facility operations manual
items.description: A digital manual with emergency procedures and specimen information
items.text: FACILITY MANUAL: Specimen classifications - Xenomorph Alpha (Class 7), Nebula Jellyfish (Class 4), Void Serpent (Class 2). Emergency override code is the sum of all specimen class numbers. Lead Researcher: Dr Helena Vex. Security Chief: Commander Rax.

items.name: blue security keycard
items.description: A magnetic keycard with blue security clearance markings

items.name: specimen information display
items.description: A holographic display showing details about the alien creatures
items.text: SPECIMEN DATABASE: Xenomorph Alpha - Highly intelligent, telepathic abilities. Nebula Jellyfish - Emits calming bioluminescence. Void Serpent - Feeds on dark matter. All specimens secured in the Containment Vault below.

items.name: emergency supply locker
items.description: A wall-mounted locker containing emergency equipment

items.name: handheld plasma cutter
items.description: A tool designed for cutting through metal barriers in emergencies

items.name: research lab entrance
items.description: A sealed door with a card reader and biometric scanner

rooms.name: Research Laboratory
rooms.description: A high-tech laboratory filled with alien specimens in stasis tubes, holographic displays, and research equipment. Glowing samples line the walls, and the air hums with energy. A massive vault door dominates the north wall, and various research stations are scattered throughout the room.

items.name: main research terminal
items.description: A sophisticated computer terminal with multiple data streams
items.text: RESEARCH LOG: Dr Helena Vex, Lead Xenobiologist. Commander Rax oversees all security protocols. The Quantum Stabilizer is stored in the vault for safekeeping. Access requires knowledge of facility personnel and specimen locations.

items.name: specimen storage cabinet
items.description: A refrigerated cabinet containing various alien samples and research materials

items.name: xenobiology research notes
items.description: Detailed notes about alien specimen behavior and characteristics
items.text: RESEARCH NOTES: The facility houses exactly 13 distinct alien species. The Quantum Stabilizer is essential for maintaining the containment fields. Without it, the specimens could break free. Emergency evacuation route is through the escape pod bay.

items.name: quantum stabilizer device
items.description: A crucial piece of technology needed to maintain alien containment systems

items.name: security override chip
items.description: A data chip that can bypass certain security protocols

items.name: facility holographic map
items.description: A 3D map showing the layout of the alien zoo facility
items.text: FACILITY MAP: Level 1 - Observation Deck. Level 2 - Research Laboratory (current location). Level 3 - Containment Vault (specimens stored here). Level 4 - Escape Pod Bay. All personnel must know their roles and specimen locations for vault access.

items.name: research workbench
items.description: A cluttered workbench with various tools and alien artifacts

items.name: facility personnel roster
items.description: A list of all facility staff and their roles
items.text: PERSONNEL ROSTER: Dr Helena Vex - Lead Researcher and Xenobiologist. Commander Rax - Security Chief. Dr Chen - Assistant Researcher. Lt Morrison - Security Officer. All specimens are housed in the Containment Vault for maximum security.

items.name: containment vault door
items.description: A massive reinforced door leading to the specimen containment area. A security terminal displays three verification questions.

password_questions.question: Who is the lead researcher?
password_questions.hint: Check the research terminal and personnel roster

password_questions.question: Who is the security chief?
password_questions.hint: The personnel roster lists all staff roles

password_questions.question: Where are the specimens stored?
password_questions.hint: The facility map and specimen display mention this location

rooms.name: Escape Pod Bay
rooms.description: You have reached the emergency escape pod bay! A sleek escape pod sits ready in its launch tube, its engines humming with power. Through the viewport, you can see the stars and the promise of freedom. The containment breach alarm continues to wail, but you have found your way out.

items.name: emergency escape pod
items.description: A small spacecraft designed for emergency evacuation, fully fueled and ready to launch

items.name: pod launch console
items.description: The control panel for launching the escape pod
items.text: LAUNCH SEQUENCE READY: All systems nominal. Quantum Stabilizer detected. Pod is cleared for immediate departure. Destination: Nearest space station.

items.name: observation viewport
items.description: A large window showing the vast expanse of space beyond the facility

rooms.win_message: SUCCESS! You board the escape pod and initiate the launch sequence. The pod detaches from the facility and rockets away into space. Through the rear viewport, you watch the Alien Zoo facility grow smaller as you head toward safety. You have escaped with your life and valuable knowledge about the alien specimens. You win!
